buildCommand: npx -y pnpm@9.12.3 --filter @sealed-exchange/fhevm-sdk run build && npx -y pnpm@9.12.3 --filter @sealed-exchange/ui run build
ignoreCommand: sh -c 'git rev-parse HEAD^ >/dev/null 2>&1 || exit 1; ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel); git -C "$ROOT" diff --quiet HEAD^ HEAD -- packages/ui packages/fhevm-sdk'
